title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.43 - Fires
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.43 - Fires

State Regulations
(a) No person shall
kindle, build, maintain, or use a fire in any place, portable receptacle, or
grill. In no event shall open or ground camp fires be allowed in any
park. (b) No person shall leave, deposit, throw away, toss or discard any lighted match, cigar, or cigarette, hot coals, or other flammable material within, on, near, or against any tree, building, structure, boat, vehicle or enclosure, or in any open
area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
